name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tweepi Bulk Default Action (aka Select All)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Performs 'Default Action' on all users on a Tweepi page. It'll help you get more followers quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Plugin to select all users on a Tweepi page. 

To select all, navigate to any Tweepi page and click the bird.
